FuncDef: The display mpls l2vc oam-mapping command displays status of an L2VPN AC established by using the LDP signaling and information about the OAM mapping table at the PSN side.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays OAM mapping information of a VC interface (LDP signaling) with the specified type and number.
-

Examples: Interface                 Active VC-ID      VC-status AC-OAM  BFD-for-PW
<HUAWEI> display mpls l2vc oam-mapping interface gigabitethernet1/0/0.1
BFD for LSP    : --    TunnelNum: --    PSN State : --
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the case that the display mpls l2vc oam-mapping command is run, basic information about the OAM mapping on all interfaces is displayed.
If an interface is specified, detailed OAM mapping information of the interface is displayed.If no interface is specified, basic OAM mapping information of all interfaces is displayed.
